abstract: The channel will promote its monthlong commemoration of Halloween with events like the Central Park Pumpkin Festival and "imagination stations" offering face painting and photo booth pictures.
snippet: The channel will promote its monthlong commemoration of Halloween with events like the Central Park Pumpkin Festival and "imagination stations" offering face painting and photo booth pictures.
lead_paragraph: As if New York were not spooky enough, the city will for the first time take part in a cable channel's celebration of the "31 Days of Halloween."

headline.main: Syfy's Halloween Events to Focus on New York City
